index.js(28,15): error TS2345: Argument of type 'number | undefined' is not assignable to parameter of type 'number'.
  Type 'undefined' is not assignable to type 'number'.


==== index.js (3 errors) ====
    /**
     * 
     * @param {number} num 
     */
    function acceptNum(num) {}

    const fn1 =

       * @param [b]
       */
      function self(a, b) {
        acceptNum(b); // error
        self("");
